alert.note: Alert for Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 29 at 4:34AM MST until November 29 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Uplands of the New Mexican Bootheel. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Occasional gusts of up to 60 mph are possible at the highest elevations of the advised area through noon today.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
